events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates and the estimated delivery date has long passed.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of a late package and no tracking updates.
Support agent Jamie has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll do my best to assist you with this delay.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking information so I can check with the courier service for updates?
Sure, my order number is 4583729, and the tracking number is ZX123456789. The tracking page hasn't updated for over a week.

I have contacted the shipping company with the details you provided. They reported a delay due to local delivery disruptions. We can either wait for it to be delivered or arrange a replacement shipment immediately.
Thank you for checking on this. I would prefer a replacement shipment as I need the item urgently.
A replacement order has been processed and will be shipped out today with expedited delivery. You will receive a new tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement order was delivered successfully. Please let us know if everything is in order or if you need further assistance.
We hope your issue has been fully resolved with the replacement delivery. We are closing this case now but feel free to reach out anytime for support.
